title: Juan's Flying Burrito - Lower Garden District
typeOfFood: Lacto, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Semi-fast burrito restaurant with a few outlets. Cooks beans without lard, rice without chicken stock. Kitchen cooks food to-order, so let your server know if you're veg/vegan. Veg items include the super green burrito (roasted veggies and chilies), veggie punk burrito (potato and chili based), sweet potato quesadilla, veggie enchilada, mardi gras Indians tacos. Funky atmosphere with a punk rock vibe. Has local beer.
